title: Sorting Algorithm Analyzer
summary: C/C++ benchmarking suite comparing classic sorting algorithms with detailed runtime analytics across different input distributions. Combines theory with empirical measurement.
process: Implemented multiple algorithms using modern C/C++ and STL patterns
Designed benchmarks with varying input sizes and distributions
Measured runtimes with chrono utilities and created detailed result tables
Compared empirical results against Big-O complexity expectations
Documented performance insights and practical recommendations
impact: Strengthened C/C++ fluency and understanding of algorithmic performance
Developed a reusable benchmarking framework for future experiments
Demonstrated systems-level thinking and optimization awareness
